text: @realDonaldTrump IF you're really interested in having a positive impact on this crisis, you'll STFU & quit tweeting. Every communication you issue is worse than the last. Your lies have uneased the economy into a recession & your lies were intended to mask your tardy, reckless #Covid19 response.
